p: To clarify this, we aimed to evaluate the possible presence of SARS-CoV-2 in urogenital fluids (seminal fluid and urine) of an infected subject. Both these samples were found negative for the viral mRNA. It should be stressed that our volunteer has collected these biological samples only on the eighth day after the first positive swab, but this was necessary due to the impaired health condition of the subject during the peak of the symptoms.
